title: Love and Obey the Lord
summary: Deuteronomy 11 urges Israel to love and obey God to receive blessings in the land. Moses reminds them of Godâ€™s mighty acts in Egypt and warns that disobedience will bring curses. He sets before them a choice: blessing or curse.

faq.question: What is the result of obeying God's commands?
faq.answer: Blessing, prosperity, and long life in the land.

faq.question: What will happen if they disobey?
faq.answer: They will face curses and lose the land God is giving them.
